attributes.action: Try Home Grown Terrorists under the Treason Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are home grown terrorists not tried under the treason act?  Would it not be more of a deterrant? Our governments tell us they will be Tough on Terrorists.  Our governments are too soft.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
